page.title: 04PRACTICE OF RELIGION
page.content: A questionnaire sent to the families at the school showed that 68% of them thought of themselves as being{Church {of England}of whom 15% go to church weekly,and 50% only go occasionally. 5% are{Roman Catholic}and they all go to church weekly. 1% are{Methodists and 3% are{Baptist}.About half of each of these denominations go weekly.25% of the sample had no particular belief.There are no {Moslems}or{Hindus in the village. When asked about{Religions Education in schools a third of the sample didn't want to reply.Of these who did a third said that they wanted it to stay as it is,another third said that they wanted it to continue but with some changes. Only 5% wanted it abolished.
